meanings.definition: A copy or reproduction of a relief printing surface, made by electroplating.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various electrotypes of ancient coins.
meanings.sent2: The library had electrotypes of famous paintings for educational purposes.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally created an electrotypes of their own artwork!
meanings.sent4: The electrotypes of the sculpture gleamed under the gallery lights.
meanings.sent5: The electrotypes were so detailed, they looked almost real.

meanings.definition: To make a copy or reproduction of a relief printing surface using electroplating.
meanings.sent1: The technician carefully electrotypes the original engraving onto a new plate.
meanings.sent2: Artists often electrotypes their designs to create multiple copies.
meanings.sent3: I will electrotypes this document to have a backup.
meanings.sent4: She electrotypes the key to make a spare for emergencies.
meanings.sent5: The company electrotypes the logo onto various products for branding.
